website_summaries.verdict: Uses a flat-edge design that some golfers will love, as it helps you grip the club properly.
pros: For those who struggle with their hand placement and grip on the green, the unique design of this putter grip forces you to keep your arms and hands on target toward the hole through the swing
Has a thick feel in the material that some golfers like
cons: A little pricier than some others
Flat sides on the grip will feel odd at first

customer_reviews.title: One of Many!
customer_reviews.text: This is just one of MANY really good grips designed specifically for Putters, and what feels best is a matter of personal choice. This grip supposedly helps keep your hands in the SAME position each time you putt, and I found that it does do that. I've had a lot of different grips on my putters over the years, and, in the end, it all comes down to your ability to read greens, and being able to start the golf ball on the correct line.
customer_reviews.author: Golfjim175

customer_reviews.title: “Fat cat”. Face (logo) up👍
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the “fat” cat. Installed it traditionally as shown in pic.. didn’t like feel to slim didn’t feel like my hands were locked in. So I turned the grip with logo facing up.. Perfect fit in hands. Filled hands locked in Consistently rolling on line chosen. Don’t automatically install this grip conventionally might be worst mistake u make.
customer_reviews.author: Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Terrific putter grip
customer_reviews.text: This putter grip gives you a better reference of where your aiming and is comfortable in the hands, the putter feels very controlled. Extremely easy to keep the club face square through impact and start the ball on line. I tried it for the first time today and every ball started on the intended line with the exception of a couple pulls (user error). If you struggle with alignment and keeping the putter face square give this grip a try, it won’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ruz

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: 2 Handicap Player- Very neat idea behind this technology. Puts your hands in the proper place and promotes proper stroke. Probably perfect for a "yipper" I loved it. 0 3 putts through my last 36 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my new grip
customer_reviews.text: awesome putter grip. My new one and has been on my club for approx 3 months. love it.
customer_reviews.author: indymojo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Putter Grip
customer_reviews.text: I love this putter grip. Helps with my yip problem
customer_reviews.author: James McGown

customer_reviews.title: Making more putts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grip.It fits perfect over my putter.The grip feels just what I was looking for . I have more control over the ball now when I hit it.Making more putts Believe it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph J. Repp

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I'm holding a hockey stick
customer_reviews.text: Feels like I'm holding a hockey stick. (positive) and the flat side allows me to concentrate and connect with direction of club head swing.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector-ken

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to. I got the fat one and it is extremely wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice putter grip. Puts your hands in the perfect position to putt.
customer_reviews.author: Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Super Stroke with this grip. Really helps square the face to the line..
customer_reviews.author: davidp

customer_reviews.title: This grip really helps with knowing exactly where the putter ...
customer_reviews.text: This grip really helps with knowing exactly where the putter face is aligned and helps keep it there at impact. Since installing this grip on a Rife putter I'm making more birdies.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T.

customer_reviews.title: Grip size
customer_reviews.text: It is really hard to decide on the size and descriptions are not that great to help.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Great feel.
customer_reviews.text: The shape is unique and puts the back of your lead hand square to the target . Great feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: Highly over rated for a putter grip and outrageously priced.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Helps square the face of the putter
customer_reviews.text: Just getting used to the new grip, maybe a little bit big but have putted well with it Looking forward to the season with my new flat cat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice feel. Hoping it will now improve my putting. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: YOU GOTTA TRY IT!
customer_reviews.text: What a simple great idea! Putted on really tough greens last week an didn't 3 putt. Excellent for 3-5 foot par savers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite grip ever
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it had only one three putt hole for the round. This saved me about four strokes! Fits right in your hand, get the line and pull the trigger. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the grip. It helps keep the putter head stable through the putt.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Crews

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life. Putting has ...
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life. Putting has always been the weakest part of my game. I even started getting the yips. I went to the claw grip which helped but when I put this grip on WOW. Third time out I birdied the first 5 holes in a row. Definitely a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit larger than I expected. Will order ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit larger than I expected. Will order the standard size for other putter and see how that feels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well, but takes a bit of getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: RSDJACOBS

customer_reviews.title: I'm a good putter and don't know why I'm messing with gimmicks
customer_reviews.text: Had it put on vertical and did not work. Cut off and bought another put on horizontal and did not work. I'm a good putter and don't know why I'm messing with gimmicks.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Poteete

product_meta.title: FLAT CAT Original Putter Grips
feature_bullets: Unique and proprietary shape immediately improves putting consistency and accuracy
The innovative FLAT1 design squares the handle to the putter face and provides TRU-alignment to the intended target line
Featuring the Easy-Glide cone for effortless removal from a player's bag
Made from a lightweight polyurethane compound for a light and comfortable grip feel
Outstanding performance during humid and wet conditions
